palm.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the inside surface of your hand, in which you hold things
palm.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: He held the pebble in the palm of his hand.
She looked at the coins in her palm.
palm.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a tropical tree which grows near beaches or in deserts, with a long straight trunk and large pointed leaves at the top
palm.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to hide something in the palm of your hand, especially when you are performing a magic trick or stealing something
